ProcedurePlanSection.name: ProcedurePlanSection
ProcedurePlanSection.description: Represents various procedure setup sections for a procedure plan definition. Each section enables the setup of a procedure of a type that can be further determined by using a rule-based criteria or it can be set based on a selected lookup table.

Description.description: The description of the procedure plan section.

IsInherited.description: Indicates if the section is inherited from a template (true) ot not (false).

Phase.description: The phase associated with the procedure plan section record.

ProcedurePlanVersionId.description: The procedure plan version associated with this procedure plan section record.

ResolutionType.description: The type of resolution used to filter the procedure.

Sequence.description: The sequence in which the procedures are processed.

SubSectionType.description: The procedure subsection added to the procedure plan definition.
